grammar_point: G1.3 Comparing items: 은/는 vs. 도
G1.5 Negative equational expression:N1은/는 N2이/가 아니에요
G3.2 Changing the topic: particle 은/는
G4.4 Expressing possessive relations: N1 (possessor) N2 (possessed)
G5.1 The locative particles 에 and 에서
G6.4 The negative adverb 안 vs 못
G7.2 무슨 'what (kind of) N' vs. 어느 'which N'

korean_text: 우리 진아 씨가 또 대만에서 단독 콘서트를 했죠?
english_text: Our Jina, you had another solo concert in Taiwan, didn't you?

korean_text: 근데 이거 여기서만 풀 수 있는 얘긴데, 보통 RM이 가사를 써서 주거든요.
english_text: By the way this is something we can only talk about here. Normally, RM writes the lyrics and gives them to us.

korean_text: 진짜루 제가... 더 늦기 전에 꼭 찾아뵙겠습니다, 선생님.
english_text: Really, I will definitely visit you before it's too late, sir.
I will see you soon with a new work.
Hello, I am actor Yoo Yeon-seok.

korean_text: 아 기사님! 저기 이쪽으로 좀 부탁드릴게요.
english_text: Excuse me, driver! please go a little in this direction.
It is a railroad that goes towards Han River New City.

korean_text: 처음에는 '안쪽으로 더 많이 들어오세요'라는 방송을 해야 하는데, 내가 만약에 또 안쪽으로 들어오라고 안내 방송을 하면
english_text: At first, I need to announce, "Please come in further." If I announce again to come in further...

grammar_point: G9.1 Expressing goal or source: N한테/께 vs. N한테서
G13.2 Expressing obligation or necessity: ~어/아야 되다

korean_text: 뜨거운 거 먹고 '어 시원하다'. 어렸을 때는 전혀
english_text: Eating something hot and saying, "Oh, it's so refreshing." I didn't understand it at all when I was young.

korean_text: 저는 '남자'인가요, '여자'인가요? 남자예요. 네, 남잡니다, 남자. 종국이 형 시원시원하다. 그럼, 거짓말 하면 안 되니까.
english_text: Am I a "man" or a "woman"? (referring to the word on her forehead). The name is for a man. Jong-kook is very straightforward. Yeah, I shouldn't lie.

grammar_point: G2.2 V.S.~기가 쉽다/어렵다 ‘it is easy/difficult to’
G2.3 N1말고 N2 ‘not N1 but N2’
G3.4~어 본 적(이) 있다/없다 ‘there has been an/no occasion of’

korean_text: 저는 '남자'인가요, '여자'인가요? 남자예요. 네, 남잡니다, 남자. 종국이 형 시원시원하다. 그럼, 거짓말 하면 안 되니까.
english_text: Am I a "man" or a "woman"? (referring to the word on her forehead). The name is for a man. Jong-kook is very straightforward. Well, I can't lie.

grammar_point: G5.2~은 편이다 ‘It is more the case of than the other’
G5.4~은지 얼마나 됐어요? ‘How long has it been since?’
G5.5~다가 transference of an action to another
G6.2 The use of the plain style in speaking
G7.3~어 있다 ‘in the state of being’
G10.2~더라고(요) Expressing the speaker’s past experience
G11.1 V.S.~나 보다/A.S.~은가 보다 ‘It seems/I guess’

korean_text: 저는 '남자'인가요, '여자'인가요? 남자예요. 네, 남잡니다, 남자. 종국이 형 시원시원하다. 그럼, 거짓말 하면 안 되니까.
english_text: Am I a "man" or a "woman"? (referring to the word on her forehead). The name is for a man. Jong-kook is very straightforward. Well, I can't lie.
